channel.title: Source Run Error
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa480/134cb/Untitled-2.png[/img]
@echo off title -Blah- "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
Thats my source run.bat im running on Windows 7 Starter, I've never had this error well running my server before but i recently transfered this file from my other laptop to my new one because i basically upgraded. Please tell me how to fix this error as for my players are really itching to play and idk how to fix this.

item.title: Source Run Error
item.dc:creator: @dds_ledg dds ledg
item.description:
@dds_ledg wrote:

[quote=“unh0ly, post:4, topic:396875”]Close your torrent.
Then run your Server.
Then re-open torrent.[/quote]

Yeah, Thats the problem. Close your torrent then run your server then you could open your torrent again. It may even only be on the icons on the right-hand corner of your screen

Read full topic

item.title: Source Run Error
item.dc:creator: @veteran_god_king_ces veteran god: king cesar
item.description:
@veteran_god_king_ces wrote:

Maybe try this? :

@echo off title (titlehere) java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
